name: Connect Group
description:
Through creatology, we create immersive connections between our clients’ brands and their customers, in an always-on world. Creatology is our unique approach of combining data, insight and creativity, with technology in order to create meaningful connections with the always-on consumer. 
Connections that help brands tell stories and create richer experiences to serve consumers. Connections that help brands build longer lasting and more profitable relationships with their customers.
